state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First off, go east. If you can get through with that, try to travel north. And then, go to the west. Then, move west. After that, make an attempt to head west. Then, make an attempt to take a trip south. After that, go east. And then, move south. With that done, attempt to go to the east. And then, make an attempt to go south. And then, go west. After that, make an attempt to travel south. After that, make an effort to travel west. And then, take the onion from the chair in the study. Got that? Good! -= Cookery =- You are in a cookery. A standard kind of place. You see a fridge. What a letdown! The fridge is empty! You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cookery =-0/1
next_state: -= Bedchamber =- You arrive in a bedchamber. An ordinary one. The room is well lit. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/2

next_state: -= Closet =- You arrive in a closet. An ordinary one. You can barely contain your excitement. You can see a closed ordinary looking display right there by you. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Closet =-0/3
